title: Font Sorting Software
content: Does anyone know of any good font sorting software for Macs?
author: BaileyDwyer

comments.content: Can you elaborate on what you mean by “sorting”?
Simple classifications, ie. serif, sans serif, script, decorative, handwriting
I’ve built my own classification groups in Font Explorer. Haven’t come across a system that would do it automatically.

You can manually sort your fonts into any number of groups with Apple’s built in Font Book application too.

JH

Thanks very much everyone! I’ve been using Linotype Font Explorer for some time now, but I wasn’t sure if there were some easier way to sort my fonts than going through them manually. I’m going to give FontCase a shot, I’ll let everyone know how it is for future reference.
